Christchurch serial rapist and sexual predator John Hope Muchirahondo jailed for 23 years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-serial-rapist-psychopath-sexual-predator-john-hope-muchirahondo-jailed-for-23-years/EYRMXMW6DJEMJEPDUJNV7UCRC4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-serial-rapist-psychopath-sexual-predator-john-hope-muchirahondo-jailed-for-23-years/EYRMXMW6DJEMJEPDUJNV7UCRC4/ Anna Leask'I use this pun intentionally ... I finally have a Hope in hell. May you rot there.'
